Caught In 
      The Crossfire 
Tuesday, June 12, at 10 p.m. 
      ET/PT
 
The chemistry between Darren 
      and Charla Mack was undeniable. They were beautiful, ambitious and shared 
      another thing – both enjoyed a very sexual lifestyle. But when the 
      marriage soured, the divorce proceedings were 
      explosive.
 
A family court judge was shot 
      in his chambers. Charla was found murdered. And Darren was on the run. How 
      would they find him?
 
As correspondent Troy 
      Roberts reports, this case is anything but open and 
      shut.
 
Roberts reports for 48 Hours Mystery, tonight at 
      10 p.m. ET/PT.
 
Watch
Roberts' 
      reporter's notebook.
